A Taste Of France

About Us

Located in Champs-Élysées, Paris, we aim to provide the real French experience. Le Poes serves the most exquisite French cuisines. From our food, to the wine, and even to the wood we use to cook our food. All of our ingredients are locally sourced, and we inspect all of them to ensure they are of the highest of quality.
